attributes.action: Brexit means Brexit - the people voted
attributes.background: The people voted to leave the EU - The PM must deliver the peoples choice.

rejection.details:
If you want article 50 to be invoked immediately you could sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133618 

If you want the UK Government and Parliament to deny the request for a second referendum, you could sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/134345
